response.job_title: Account Manager en Hilti Latin America
response.summary:
Mechanical Engineer with a strong academic background from the National University of Colombia, and diplomas in Project Management and Production and Operations Management. Over 4 and a half years of experience in the construction and industry sector, focusing on both commercial and technical aspects through B2B negotiations.

I stand out for my ability to quickly learn and adapt to different environments, successfully taking on new challenges. I receive feedback positively and apply it diligently to improve my performance and contribute to achieving goals.

I possess solid technical skills to tackle complex projects and find effective solutions, with a focus on process optimization and continuous improvement. I have experience in building strong relationships with clients and collaborators, understanding their needs, and offering suitable technical solutions. I have achieved success in B2B negotiations and possess the ability to identify opportunities and close successful business deals
response.skills: Documentación técnica, Microsoft Office, Ingeniería, Liderazgo de equipos, Ingeniería mecánica, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD)

company.name: Hilti Latin America
company.description:
Globally, we employ some 33,000 people in more than 120 countries. From our strong and prosperous position, we’re looking to reinforce our market leadership in the future. To do this, we’re seeking high-performing people with the excellence and drive to take Hilti forward. Hilti provides leading-edge technology to the global construction, energy and industry sectors. Hilti products, services and software offer professional innovative solutions with outstanding added value. The headquarters of the Hilti Group are in Schaan in the Principality of Liechtenstein.

Our leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services power the global construction industry, including some of the world’s most ambitious feats of engineering. To deliver these innovative solutions to our customers, we’re always looking for dedicated, high-performing people to join our team.

We have a unique working culture, made up of people from different backgrounds with a shared commitment to exceptional customer engagement. It’s a dynamic and fast-paced place to work, where success relies on teamwork and we challenge you to push boundaries. There’s a distinct vibrant energy that you can’t help but feel.

location.address: Torre de las Américas – Torre C - Piso 23
